meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to one reciprocal ohm.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the abmhos of the circuit to determine its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The abmhos of the wire indicated its ability to conduct electricity.
meanings.sent3: The abmhos of the toaster was so high that it toasted bread in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence was like an abmhos, effortlessly conducting knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The abmhos of the river's current was so strong, it could power a small turbine.

meanings.definition: The plural form of abmho, a unit of electrical conductance equal to one reciprocal ohm.
meanings.sent1: The lab equipment displayed various abmhos for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The abmhos in the circuit were carefully recorded by the technician.
meanings.sent3: The abmhos in the room seemed to hum a harmonious tune.
meanings.sent4: The team's unity created an abmhos of collaboration, leading to success.
meanings.sent5: The abmhos of teamwork among the ants was truly impressive.
